WSUS32 KKCI 270855 
SIGC

VALID UNTIL 1055Z 
KS 
FROM 40N SLN-30WSW MCI 
DMSHG LINE TS 30 NM WIDE MOV FROM 29030KT. TOPS TO FL360.

FROM GFK-DLH-ODI-BUM-TUL-END-HLC-FSD-GFK

PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
